meanings.definition: Relating to or located at an antinode.
meanings.sent1: The antinodal point in the wave had the highest amplitude.
meanings.sent2: The antinodal regions were clearly visible in the standing wave.
meanings.sent3: The antinodal party was where everyone gathered to celebrate.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, creating an antinodal effect.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the flowers created an antinodal contrast to the green leaves.

meanings.definition: Opposite in nature or position to a node.
meanings.sent1: The antinodal viewpoint provided a different perspective.
meanings.sent2: The antinodal approach led to a completely different outcome.
meanings.sent3: His antinodal thinking always surprised his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: Their relationship was like an antinodal reflection of each other.
meanings.sent5: The two characters were antinodal in their personalities, one outgoing and the other shy.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the region of maximum amplitude between two nodes in a standing wave.
meanings.sent1: The antinodal areas showed where the wave was strongest.
meanings.sent2: The antinodal points were crucial for understanding the wave pattern.
meanings.sent3: The antinodal zone was where the energy of the wave peaked.
meanings.sent4: Her voice resonated in the antinodal space, filling the room.
meanings.sent5: The antinodal segment of the wave was where the magic happened.
